name: caterpillar
description: Full-fledged REST API core with Express and Mongo.

scripts.dependency-check: npm run log-prefix && echo 'Checking dependencies...' && nsp check --output checkstyle || true && echo ''
scripts.git-compress: echo '' && npm run log-prefix && echo 'Compressing git repository...' && git gc && echo ''
scripts.postinstall:
npm run log-prefix && echo 'Dependencies successfully resolved.
' && npm run dependency-check || true

author: James Pietras <bancroy@gmail.com>
